name: PanoPick
description:
Want to see who actually beats the sports books? Want to prove to the world you're the best in the world at picking spreads and player props? PanoPick tracks everyone transparently with a system of bankroll management, so you can finally know who the top winners are. Plus you can get certified, and finally prove you are one.

Our unique Capping Tieramid allows you to get go from being a free agent to the GOAT, getting certificates of achievement every step of the way. So come show off your skills at making all the right picks at PanoPick today, and we will let the world know how good you are.

We have a commitment to transparency and quality you won't find anywhere else. We're an app made by people that love sports, for people that love sports.
